data.eml:eml: A revision of the Neotropical spider genus Ancylometes Bertkau (Araneae: Pisauridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Höfer, H., Brescovit, A. D. (2000): A revision of the Neotropical spider genus Ancylometes Bertkau (Araneae: Pisauridae). Insect Systematics & Evolution 31: 323-360, URL: http://unknown
